content:
Sure, here are the revised .svg files for the Infrared Footprint and Motor Bracket Footprint, with added rectangles around the border:

Infrared Footprint:
```
<svg width="96.5mm" height="20.5mm" viewBox="0 0 96.5 20.5" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="96.5" height="20.5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="7" cy="4.25" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="24" cy="4.25" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="72.5" cy="4.25" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="89.5" cy="4.25" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>
```
Motor Bracket Footprint:
```
<svg width="15mm" height="5mm" viewBox="0 0 15 5" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="15" height="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="3.5" cy="2.5" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="11.5" cy="2.5" r="1.5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>
```
I hope these revised .svg files meet your requirements. Let me know if you have any further questions.
